s: ^I'm chillin', just preparing for the weekend. You?

Chat1: ^Rashad?Smiling "Ahhh yeah! I'm great. Cheryl and the kids just stopped by so I'm still riding those good vibes. How about you?

s: ^You heard Mrs. Lee's got a new gig over at the Community Center?

Chat2: ^Rashad?Smiling "Cheryl is doing great actually. She's been loving these workout classes they're holding at the Community Center. She said Mrs. Lee goes too; they have a blast."

s: ^Oh my gosh. I love that for Mrs. Lee and Cheryl
^Do you wonder where Mrs. Lee gets her energy? She impresses me so much!

Chat3: ^Rashad?Smiling "Yeah it's really special for Cheryl. She never really knew Mrs. Lee until recently. Now they are exchanging recipes over email."

s: ^I should get Mrs. Lee's email... she makes the best glass noodles!
^I would love to get on that email thread!

Explain1: ^Rashad?Smiling "She's pretty impressive with her tech, too! I once suggested she sit in the computer class we hold here. She knew the most out of all my seniors!

s: ^You offer classes at the Library, like workshops? Huh!
^I should come to a workshop sometime.

Explain2: ^Rashad?Smiling "Yeah we have tons of workshops at the Library. We work hard to be an awesome resource, not just for older folks."
^Rashad?Smiling "I started out as the youth librarian, and created all sorts of workshops for teens."
^Rashad?Smiling "Librarians help people find great books, but we also answer questions and help with things, when we can."

s: ^What's the next cool thing you're hosting?

Suggestion1: ^Rashad_Day 2_Mrs. Lee can go to the health programming workshop at the Library and ask for help_Mrslee2-1

Suggestion1.#: notification Rashad_Day 2_Mrs. Lee can go to the health programming workshop at the Library and ask for help_Mrslee2-1

Suggestion1: ^Rashad?Smiling "Tonight is... the health programming workshop. Actually a lot of people show up for this one. We help them figure out various useful online systems."
^Rashad?Smiling "As more health resources move online, a basic literacy in how to use the internet becomes more important."
^Rashad?Smiling "It really means a lot to me that we're able to offer that to our neighbors."

s: ^Do people ever ask for help using websites and other computer tasks?
^That's exactly what I needed to hear.

Suggestion2: ^Rashad_Day 2_Mrs. Lee can ask Rashad to schedule her appointment_Mrslee2-2

Suggestion2.#: notification Rashad_Day 2_Mrs. Lee can ask Rashad to schedule her appointment_Mrslee2-2

Suggestion2: ^Rashad?Smiling "If you're in the Library, it is literally my job to help you. Need help with something? I got you."
^Rashad?Smiling "Figuring out the copy machine? I got you. Setting up an email address? I can help! I'm one of the resources the Library offers, man!"

s: ^You are the best Rashad, you don't even know!

Goodbye: ^ always fun talkin' to ya. See you around."
